author: Emily Ashton
title: A UK Daytime TV Host Is Being Criticised For Failing To Shut Down A Conspiracy Theory Linking Coronavirus To 5G
description: Eamonn Holmes took aim at the "mainstream media" for dismissing the baseless theory. View Entire Post ›
content:
ITV presenter Eamonn Holmes has been widely criticised for apparently fuelling a conspiracy theory that 5G is causing the coronavirus pandemic.
He was co-hosting daytime show This Morning on Monday when he suggested that people were right to question whether… [+950 chars]
